title: Taxon
description: A group of organisms (sensu http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/OBI_0100026) considered by taxonomists to form a homogeneous unit.

genus.description: The full scientific name of the genus in which the collection's taxa are classified.

taxonRank.description: The taxonomic rank of the most specific name in the scientificName.

nomenclaturalCode.description: The nomenclatural code (or codes in the case of an ambiregnal name) under which the scientificNames of objects in the collection are constructed.

vernacularName.description: A common or vernacular name for the collection's taxon.

order.description: The full scientific name of the order in which the collection's taxa are classified.

family.description: The full scientific name of the family in which collection's taxa are identified.

class.description: The full scientific name of the class in which the collection's taxa are classified.

phylum.description: The full scientific name of the phylum or division in which the collection's taxa are classified.

kingdom.description: The full scientific name of the kingdom in which the taxa in the collection are classified.

scientificName.description: The full scientific name. This should be the name in lowest level taxonomic rank that applies across the collection.

identifier.description: One or more Identifiers relating to the Taxon

reference.description: One or more References relating to the Taxon

measurementOrFact.description: One or more Measurement Or Facts relating to the Taxon
